SELECT mem_id ,mem_pass , mem_name , TO_CHAR(mem_bir, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS mem_bir, mem_zip , mem_add1 , mem_add2 , mem_hp , mem_mail , mem_job , mem_hobby, mem_mileage , mem_del_yn FROM member WHERE mem_id = #{memId}
